description:
When the power keeps cutting out in Bubbletown, Abby decides to take matters into her own hands and catch the culprit. The rest of the Botties join her mission. Soon enough, Dr. K and Kolossal show up and manage to break a gas main - sending the Botties on a race to save Sewwix, get Solex, and save Bubbletown from exploding!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: 地下で事件だ! コンボック
